Please don't get me wrong, but I believe there's differential treatments between the servers, why do all servers have to reach the exact same mile marker in regards to points?


I don't know the size of the playerbase on each server, but seeing as that is the deciding factor here, I'd like to refer you to this news feed that was posted on EUW just 3 days ago, regarding that exact issue.
http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/euw-spectator-mode-fell-over-recently-heres-why

>  EUW happens to be Riot’s largest shard globally
> ~ Riot tmx

Beyond that, I don't use facebook, so even if we should miraculously reach that mile marker I won't get a 'Mystery Champ' (I own all champs but that's beside the point in this regard).

Don't get me wrong I love this new idea, but I just believe it deserved a little more thought, before going into production.
Straight up, if you want the Mystery Champ and don't use Facebook, just make a fake account. It won't hurt anyone's feelings.
Little shortcuts like these tips given by Riot are why I love the company.

Yeah, there are a lot of times that people rage at the company, but even if you just watch the newsfeed in the client over the course of a day, you can see that they are always paying attention to the community and trying to make the game more fun for everyone.

Just to clear it up, if we hit level 6 and you don't own Mundo, you totes get the champ and the skin!
Hey NaKyle, we can purchase Pool Party Mundo before we hit level 6 right? If so, what happens if we already have that skin

You should be granted PP Mundo before he's in the store. Since Team Up Week ends before the skins drop, everyone who contributes points should be auto-granted PP Mundo (and Mundo, if necessary) right before he hits the store.

I have a question. If we get the 55 million to unlock mundo{{champion:36}} does that mean we get everything else above the 55 million also?
pretty obvious dude

Guys and girls, I think we're going to make it at least to level 5, possibly all the way to Mundo. Here's why:

1. Only three days have passed. We still have all of Thursday (pretty much), Friday, Saturday, and Sunday to go.
2. People will play more on the weekend.
3. Each day has seen an increased number of points. Day 1 was about 3, Day 2 was about 4, and day 3 was about 7 million points.

We're at about 14 million right now. If we get 7 million today and tomorrow and 10 million on Saturday and Sunday, that means our grand total will be 48 million without even having to stretch much.

If you need to join a team, get in one of these public chat rooms in your League client and ask for an invite to earn pool party points:

Classic:
- RedditLFG
Elo & Level:
- BronzeLFG
- SilverLFG
- GoldLFG
- PlatinumLFG
- DiamondLFG
- Pre30LFG
Other Game Modes:
- DominionLFG
- ARAMLFG
Other Chatrooms:
- pool party
- 55Millionpoints
- Team UP Week
- TeamUpPoolPartyRewards
- Team Up

If a room is full, you can often just add a 2 or 3 to the end of the name to find a second or third version of it.

This list came off a Reddit post here: http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/39wbr7/so_the_team_up_pool_party_event_is_live_here_are/

I tried it and it works in a matter of seconds, at all hours of the day and night.

Now go forth and earn points with confidence that we are going to get awesome stuff!

You guys have to consider that it's only Tuesday. That means 2 things:
1. Friday, Saturday, and Sunday (maybe even Thursday) more people will play.
2. Since level 1 is an IP bonus for a 5-man party, a lot more people are gonna get into 5-man premades.

TL;DR: Don't lose hope, we still have a chance.
